00085             template <class SubObjectType>
00086             boost::shared_ptr<const SubObjectType> subObjectAtIndex(ObjectID object_id, ObjectIndex index) const
00087             {
00088                 ConstSerializablePtr child(subObjectAtIndex(object_id, index));
00089                 if (child)
00090                 {
00091                     boost::shared_ptr<const SubObjectType> sub_object_ptr(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const SubObjectType>(child));
00092                     if (!sub_object_ptr)
00093                     {
00094                         throw SerializableError("SerializableComposite::subObject() - programming error. ID does not match object type");
00095                     }
00096                     return sub_object_ptr;
00097                 }
00098                 return boost::shared_ptr<const SubObjectType>();
00099             }

00113                 }

00187             template <class SubObjectType>
00188             boost::shared_ptr<SubObjectType> addSubObject(ObjectID object_id)
00189             {
00190                 boost::shared_ptr<SubObjectType> sub_object(SerializableFactory::newObject<SubObjectType>(object_id));
00191                 if (!sub_object)
00192                 {
00193                     throw SerializableError("SerializableComposite::addSubObject - unable to create object or object not castable to type");
00194                 }
00195                 addSubObject(sub_object);
00196                 return sub_object;
00197             }

00222             template <class SubObjectType>
00223             boost::shared_ptr<SubObjectType> addIfMissing(ObjectID object_id)
00224             {
00225                 boost::shared_ptr<SubObjectType> sub_object(subObject<SubObjectType>(object_id));
00226                 if (!sub_object)
00227                 {
00228                     sub_object = addSubObject<SubObjectType>(object_id);
00229                 }
00230                 return sub_object;
00231             }
